page.title: 14THE NETHERLEY SHOW.
page.content: Every year the{Netherley Show}is held at our school. The estate has a lot of{social problems}so 14 years ago some people began to hold a{carnival} to try to lift peoples'{morale.}This grew into a big show where 10,000 attend during the first week in{June.} The{teachers}collect the entrance fee of 20 pence and they keep 60% of this to{subsidise}school trips for us. All{profit}from the show goes to {local charities.}I like going to the show because there is a lot to do for{ {all ages.}I think that the{Fun Fair}is best. There was a ride one year that turned you upsidedown and all your money fell out of your pockets. There is Horse Jumping, Morris Dancing, 5-a-side Football, and BMX contests, brass bands and parachute jumps. The worst thing about the show is the{ {litter}which spoils the field for days
